data.title: Calendar Submission Guidelines
data.meta_description: Submit your event to be included in CityBeat's online event calendar.
data.text:
Add your event to the most comprehensive calendar and online events listing in town.

To make sure your listing is included in the print and online editions of CityBeat, please complete this calendar event submission form at least two weeks before the date of the event. Provide complete event details and contact info.

Calendar Submission Guidelines

General rules

Info must be received two weeks prior to the event

No submissions by phone

Follow the specific rules below

If you submit an image to be included with your listing, you must have permission to use that image. By submitting an image with your listing, you confirm you have permission to use that image.

Give us a phone number or email we can reach you at if we have questions!

Music listings must include

Band's name

Venue

Time of performance*

Cover price

*The default concert time is 9 pm. If you don't specify, your event will be listed as beginning at 9 pm.

Visual art listings must include

Artist's name, description of their work

Gallery/ Location and Gallery Hours

Opening Reception hours, if applicable

Run Dates of the exhibit (i.e. May 2-May 30)

All other listings must include

Name of the production/event

Location

Performance/event hours

Admission prices

Description of the event.
